description: Built an MCP infrastructure platform connecting any AI model to any tool through a unified API. Developed frontend components with React and Next.js and backend services with Python FastAPI. Integrated third-party services including Clerk auth, Stripe billing, and Supabase database management, and contributed to core features enabling developers to deploy and use tool-calling AI agents.

Designed web and mobile interfaces in Figma, completing 32 design tickets and collaborating with cross-functional teams. Led the Mileage Tracking feature from prototype to final design, while maintaining design systems and component libraries.

Through the Apple Developer Program, I have designed and developed four apps available on the App Store with over 20,000 downloads combined. I use Swift and SwiftUI to build robust and scalable architectures, ensuring high performance and reliability. I have created intuitive interfaces for each app, focusing on user-friendly navigation and engaging interactions. I have also leveraged emerging technologies like spatial computing through RealityKit to build innovative and immersive experiences.
